title: Touring England
brief_description: Tour scenic England, the island in the silver sea that holds a special place for us all. See Royal London, Windsor Castle, Blenheim Palace, Bath, Stratford-on-Avon, Stonehenge, Oxford, Cambridge, York, Cliffs of Dover and Wales.
